alert.note: Alert for Kleberg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 22 at 8:03AM CDT until August 22 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Kleberg County in south central Texas... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 802 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Malaquite Beach, or 23 miles south of Corpus Christi, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Kleberg County, including the following locations... Loyola Beach. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
